subcategories.name: Territory Building
features: Interaction between players often revolves around resources or dominance.

subcategories.name: Civilization
features: May include a technology tree or cultural development.

subcategories.name: Adventure
features: Includes character development and equipment upgrades.

subcategories.name: Exploration
features: Often includes a modular board or map.

subcategories.name: Fantasy
features: Incorporates magic, mythical creatures, or supernatural elements.
Heavy thematic design and often features narrative depth.

subcategories.name: Economic
features: Focus on trade, market dynamics, and financial growth.

subcategories.name: Farming / Industry / Manufacturing
features: Players grow, produce, or refine resources.
Often tied to worker placement or production chains.

subcategories.name: Fighting
features: Direct combat between players or against NPC enemies.
Often uses dice rolls or tactical grids.

subcategories.name: Bluffing
features: Players attempt to deceive others or guess hidden information.
